text: The Rules of Attraction is a 2002 American satirical black comedy-drama movie. It stars James van der Beek and Jessica Biel. This movie is based on the novel of the same name by Bret Easton Ellis. It is about events at a fictional college in New Hampshire. The Rules of Attraction was originally rated NC-17 by the MPAA, although edits were performed by Lionsgate so that the movie could get an R rating. == Other websites == * * * * * Category:2002 comedy- drama movies Category:2002 LGBT movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:2000s English-language movies Category:Movies based on books Category:NC-17 rated movies Category:New Hampshire Category:2000s black comedy movies Category:American independent movies Category:Lionsgate movies
title: The Rules of Attraction
